skillTree.localised_description: A gift to Wurrzag from the Iron Pig tribe, Spleenrippa is his dependable, and terrifying, War Boar mount.

effects.description: Mount: Spleenrippa

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Tunnel bosses are Greenskins who are good at shoutin’ and hollerin’ at mobs when underground, where space and sight is an issue.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +10 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Bellower’s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield, making sure the boyz are focused on the carnage.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: No need for 'smarts' or thinkin' like a Goblin. Just smash 'em harder; that's the Orc-y way!

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8 for Savage Orc units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Savage Orc units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: These Savage Orcs, and the Warboars that bear them, give no quarter on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8 for Savage Orc cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10% for Savage Orc cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those on the wrong side of Wurrzag find themselves blasted apart by his magic or, worse, turned into Squigs!

effects.description:
Enables magical attacks
	(Lord's army)

Strips enemies of any magic resistance they may have!
	(local enemy armies)

skillTree.localised_description: Fighting Wurrzag is relatively disconcerting. His feet stamp out the wild of rhythm of the Savage Orcs as he jigs in and out of the fight.

effects.description: Speed: +25%
Melee defence: +15
Attribute: Perfect Vigour

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: While locating enough paint for the job ain't easy, no one can deny the results!

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 20% for Trolls, Giant, Arachnarok Spider and Rogue Idol units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 5%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Wurrzag's feet move to a rhythm only he can hear, but he's more than happy to share!

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.localised_description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +15
Ability: "Arcane Conduit"

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Orcs may be stronger, but Goblins are smarter, nastier, and better-er.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Goblin and Night Goblin missile infantry units

skillTree.localised_description: Greenskin cavalry can be devastating if the myriad mounts can behave. Getting a big stick and maybe a "carrot" in the form of an orange-painted gobbo is the answer!

effects.description:
Speed: +6% for all melee cavalry, Orc Boar Chariot, and Squig Herd units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +9% for all melee cavalry, Orc Boar Chariot, and Squig Herd units

	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for all melee cavalry, Orc Boar Chariot, and Squig Herd units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Boss is one with "da boyz", egging the lads on to greater feats and to hit bigga stuff with their choppas.

Missile strength: +6% for Orc Arrer Boyz and Savage Orc Arrer Boyz units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for all Orc infantry units

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Ridin’ on chariots means ya can be even more fighty, an' even more killy!

effects.description:
Armour: +4 for Chariots and Pump Wagon units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for all missile cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Range: +10% for all missile cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Even bigga than a Black Orc, an' not bad at killin’ too!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Boss realises the power of "flyin’ fings” and so invests a few teef in making sure his war machines can fling fings really far and really high!

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units

	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units
	(Lord's army)
Ability: "Get Back 'Ere!"

skillTree.localised_description: The sneakiest and stabbiest gobboes are just as dangerous as the largest, fiercest Orcs.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 15% for all Goblin, Pump Wagon, Night Goblin and Squig Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for all Goblin, Pump Wagon, Night Goblin and Squig Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for all Goblin, Pump Wagon, Night Goblin and Squig Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: ‘Ardest of da ‘Ard. Don’t mess, gottit?

effects.description:
Ward save: 8% for all Orc units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for all Orc units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for all Orc units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: It’s one fing to be big, but quite anuva to be strong as well!

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Nuffin' smashes harder than a rock fallin' from da sky, except mebbe da Bad Moon, if it were to fall.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +20% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units (Rank 7 and above)

	(Lord's army)

Ability: "Smash 'Em Faster"

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: A wise Boss knows how to lure the enemy into places where they can be ambushed or trapped with mobs that skulk in the tunnels below.

effects.description: Evasion chance when using the Underway: +6%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +16%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +30%

skillTree.localised_description: Raiders are good at marauding through enemy settlements - sending their denizens fleeing as their properties are despoiled.

effects.description:
Income from raiding: +6%
	(Lord's army)

Income from raiding: +16%
	(Lord's army)

Income from raiding: +30%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!

effects.description: Income from looting settlements: +3%
Income from looting settlements: +8%
Income from looting settlements: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: Ravagers are merciless - they will sack an enemy settlement, take everything and kill any that get in their way.

effects.description: Income from sacking settlements: +3%
Income from sacking settlements: +8%
Income from sacking settlements: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: These iron-hard gits are particularly tough and gnarly Greenskins, who - even if wounded - will be up and ready to fight before too long.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for Lords
	(Lord's army)
Wound recovery time: -1

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: Occasionally an Orc will come along who is more "kunning" than the rest. He quickly rises in ranks as his plans end in victory.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +6%
	(Lord's army)

Ambush success chance: +16%
	(Lord's army)

Ambush success chance: +30%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Boss that has the loyalty of the mobs means he doesn’t have to worry so much about "da boring stuff" like tents and bedding, as they’ll fight for him no matter what.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -3% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -8% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -15% for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Being green meanz ya really mean.

effects.description:
Untainted: +1
	(local province)

Untainted: +2
	(local province)

Untainted: +3
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

	(Lord's army)

This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: “Da Godz speak ta me. Listen, and I’ll tell ya.”
